Symptoms: Derealization (Feeling like the world is unreal)
Example: Everything feels fake around me
I feel like I’m watching myself from the outside

Symptoms: Agitation, restlessness, or inability to sit still
Example: I always feel like I have to move
I start things but never finish them
I do things that I know are dangerous
I’m always exhausted, even after sleeping

Symptoms: Unexplained body aches or muscle pain
Example: My body hurts for no reason
I get stress headaches every day

Symptoms: Digestive issues (Nausea, stomach pain, IBS-like symptoms)
Example: My stomach always feels upset

Symptoms: Tension or tightness in the body
Example: My shoulders and neck are always stiff

Symptoms: Shortness of breath or chest tightness
Example: It feels like I can’t breathe
I have no appetite lately

Symptoms: Weight fluctuations (Unintentional weight loss or gain)
Example: I’ve lost weight without trying
I can’t fall asleep at night
I start trembling when I get anxious

Symptoms: Heightened sensitivity to sounds, lights, or textures
Example: Loud noises overwhelm me
I don’t feel my body like I used to

Symptoms: Hallucinations (Hearing, seeing, or feeling things that aren’t there)
Example: I sometimes hear whispers
Everything looks too bright or too sharp

Symptoms: Flashbacks or vivid memories of past events
Example: It felt like I was back in that moment

Symptoms: Hypervigilance or feeling constantly on edge
Example: I always feel like something bad is about to happen
I have the same nightmare every night

Symptoms: Avoidance of places, people, or situations
Example: I can’t go near that place anymore
I get overwhelmed by emotions randomly

I always assume the worst will happen
I panic when I see spiders

Symptoms: Restlessness or feeling unable to relax

I have to count things to feel okay

Symptoms: Low self-discipline or difficulty maintaining routines
Example: I can’t stick to habits
I don’t know how to put my feelings into words
I always feel like people will leave me

Symptoms: Struggles with maintaining friendships or relationships
Example: I always push people away
I don’t relate to people anymore
I tell people too much too soon
I don’t think I matter
